generateInitialResponse(ServerPlayerEntity) - Methode in Klasse villagertalk.villagertalk.VillagerTalk
Generates the initial response for a player.
generateLLMResponse(String, ServerPlayerEntity) - Methode in Klasse villagertalk.villagertalk.VillagerTalk
Generates a response to a chathistory using VillagerTalk.makeAPICall(List) Uses VillagerTalk.findExistingChat(UUID villager, UUID player) to find the existing VillagerChatData for the player and villager.
generateVillagerName() - Methode in Klasse villagertalk.villagertalk.VillagerChatData
Generates a random name for the villager.
getChatHistoryAsString() - Methode in Klasse villagertalk.villagertalk.VillagerChatData
Formats VillagerChatData.chatHistory as a string, formatted for display in the chat UI.
